name: Solitaire Monstars
description:
Come on and play with the band!! Solitaire Monstars of Rock™, is one of the most unique free solitaire cards game on iOS! Our free solitaire game has over 190 levels - with more on the way! You are Mort Barker- music promoter extraordinaire- who brings Dead Acts Back to Life. Use your solitaire playing skills to help the band succeed. What are you waiting for? Get on the tour bus and Download Solitaire Monstars of Rock today.

ROCK OUT SOLITAIRE
- Play your cards right to obtain Streak awards which unlock solitaire BONUSES!
- More than 190 challenging levels
- Uncover the moon card and other hidden cards for special rewards.
- Fun Monstars rocking soundtrack and effects.
- Finish each level in time to earn more COINS!
- Rock on classic solitaire with a special monster rock twist that includes elements of Klondike, Spider, FreeCell, and Pyramid solitaire games.
-Share scores with friends and family

MONSTARS REVIEWS ROCK: Please review our game if you try it. We know you hate leaving reviews but they help us out a lot. So, if you can think of nothing to say, just leave a review saying "Rock On Dude" if you love it or "Bogus" if you hate it. However, we love full and honest reviews as they really help. As always, Five stars would be awesome.

Are you a blogger? We'd love for you to tell your readers about our apps. You can download images and resources at http://www.itecgames.com or contact us at support@itecgames.com for any other information you might need.

For questions or technical issues email us at: support@itecgames.com
